items.value: %113% has discovered that a %111% named %00@ is preparing to return to %04@ soon.

%113% took the guise of a grizzled hunter and started a conversation with %00@. He managed to dissuade %00@ from leaving by telling tales of hidden treasures in the area. They have parted ways already.

%113% took the guise of a grizzled hunter and started a conversation with %00@. He attempted to dissuade %00@ from leaving by telling tales of hidden treasures in the area but %83b was unconvinced. It doesn't look like we can do anything to stop %84b from leaving anymore.
%113% failed to stop %00@ from leaving to %04@.
